text: Zoe Lister-Jones (born September 1, 1982) is an American actress, producer, director, dramatist, singer and writer. She co-stars in the CBS sitcom Life in Pieces. She is also known for her work on the television shows Delocated, Whitney, and New Girl. Lister-Jones was born in Brooklyn, New York. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American playwrights Category:Actors from New York City Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Singers from New York City
title: Zoe Lister-Jones
